DOC.detailed_description: The patient split two group : one group supplement whey protein , soy protein . Participants assess three moment : start intervention 8 16 week . The nutritional status body composition measure use bioimpedance analysis , anthropometry albumin pre-albumin dosage . Dietary intake determine 24-h dietary recall . The disease activity evaluate Crohn 's Disease Activity Index , serum cytokine C-reactive protein dosage .
